titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow rehabilitation expenditures for public school buildings to qualify for rehabilitation credit.

bill.summary:
School Infrastructure Modernization Act of 2021
This bill allows rehabilitation expenditures for public school buildings to qualify for the rehabilitation tax credit.
